tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE loan_default_prediction (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  credit_score INT,
  income DECIMAL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL,
  employment_status VARCHAR,
  years_employed INT
)

CREATE TABLE CreditHistory (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  credit_score FLOAT,
  loan_amount FLOAT,
  loan_duration INT,
  payment_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE FinancialData (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  income FLOAT,
  expenses FLOAT,
  savings FLOAT,
  employment_status VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Loan_Default_Prediction (
    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    credit_score INT,
    income DECIMAL,
    loan_amount DECIMAL,
    default_likelihood DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Credit_History (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    loan_id INT,
    credit_score INT,
    credit_limit DECIMAL,
    late_payments INT
);

CREATE TABLE Financial_Data (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    income DECIMAL,
    expenses DECIMAL,
    savings DECIMAL,
    debt DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE borrowers (
    borrower_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    credit_score INT,
    income DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE loans (
    loan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    borrower_id UUID REFERENCES borrowers(borrower_id),
    loan_amount DECIMAL,
    interest_rate DECIMAL,
    loan_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE credit_history (
    credit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    borrower_id UUID REFERENCES borrowers(borrower_id),
    late_payments INT,
    missed_payments INT,
    credit_limit DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    borrower_id UUID REFERENCES borrowers(borrower_id),
    savings DECIMAL,
    investments DECIMAL,
    expenses DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    credit_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE loans (
    loan_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    loan_amount DECIMAL,
    loan_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE payments (
    payment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    loan_id INT REFERENCES loans(loan_id),
    payment_amount DECIMAL,
    payment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE credit_history (
    credit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    credit_rating VARCHAR(10),
    credit_limit DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
    financial_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    income DECIMAL,
    expenses DECIMAL
)
